name: Monster Truck Escape: Car Race
description:
'Monster Truck Escape' is all about adventurous escape that’s full of hasty pace and adrenal boosting thrill. You could not resist your crave of stealing valuable assets but now have a challenge to escape.

Use the lifts and ramps to navigate your way through the levels but beware of car crushers waiting to end you. Smash through obstacles or use them to cross the level.

Features:

- Amazing physics emulation.
- Beautiful 3D Graphics.
- Smooth and Easy Controls.
- Lots of Monster Truck to unlock.
- Several worlds and tons of levels.
- Crazy jumps, lifts, crushers, obstacles, and loops to cross.
